content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_door
inventory=[{"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 38, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 63, "index": 36}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 39}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: I need to craft an acacia_door. To do this, I need to place 6 acacia_planks in a specific pattern in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one acacia_plank from slot 43 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_door
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 38, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 63, "index": 36}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 39}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 43}]
thought: I have moved one acacia_plank to slot 1. I need to move another acacia_plank to the right of it, so I will move one acacia_plank from slot 43 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have two acacia_planks in the first two slots of the crafting grid, I need to move another acacia_plank to the left of the second acacia_plank. I will move one acacia_plank from slot 43 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
